summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4723 for the improvement of Valley Street from 2nd Avenue North to 5th Avenue North, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 54644, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
